DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
When the Deconstruction's stack amount reaches the limit, it explodes and deals damage.
When the stack amount of Deconstruction reaches the limit, deal damage equal to the stack amount of Organic Deconstruction.
